message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it has the potential to bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $1800000 is a bit steep. Would you be willing to consider $1500000?

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1700000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I believe the product's value is worth more than what you're offering. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $1500000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for this price?
